structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Inspection And Supervision; Rules And Regulations
law.text: Boards of health of towns within their towns shall inspect, and the department of public health shall inspect and supervise all cold storage or refrigerating warehouses and shall make such inspection of the entry of articles of food therein as they deem necessary to secure proper enforcement of the laws relative to cold storage. The department may make rules and regulations to secure a proper enforcement of sections sixty-six to seventy-two, inclusive, and ninety-two.
